mapper.update: update diet set scode = #{scode:INTEGER}, DIETDATE = #{dietDate:DATE}, MAINDISH = #{mainDish:VARCHAR}, SIDEDISH = #{sideDish:VARCHAR} where DIETNO= #{dietNo:INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT dietNo, scode, to_char(DIETDATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd') dietDate, mainDish, sideDish FROM diet where (dietdate BETWEEN to_date(to_char(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'IW'), 'yyyymmdd')) and to_date(to_char(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'IW'), 'yyyymmdd')) + 4.99999) ORDER BY DIETDATE, SCODE

SELECT a.maindish maindish, b.mno mno FROM(SELECT scode, maindish FROM DIET WHERE TO_CHAR(dietDate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd') ) a, (SELECT prefer , mno FROM member WHERE prefer IS not NULL ) b WHERE b.prefer LIKE '%'||a.maindish||'%' AND mno=#{mno:INTEGER}
